about_the_game:
Hop aboard the Mystery Train! Whether you need a setting for an elaborate murder mystery or just a fancy ride for cross-country travel, this Orient Express inspired train should fit the bill. Includes completely animated train and cars, plus full interior tiles.

The Mystery Train Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles (all in tan and brown variations):

Textured rug
Edged rug
Two styles of tables
Plain floor

Walls:

Simple, edged and paneled walls in tan and brown, plus two art deco wallpaper styles!

Also featuring:

art deco-style lighting
piano
tables and more table styles
luggage racks and luggage
windows with night/day variations
signs (with blank)
two styles of beds
seating with adjustable width/corners
curtains
corner cabinets (with built in sink variation)
fancy doors (with animations)
small decorative pillars
bath supplies (mirror, tub, toilet, etc)
cabinets with open/closed doors
table and bar supplies (plates, wine glasses, decanters, etc)
control panels
plus more!

Events and Animations

* train cars in vertical and horizontal formats
* includes locomotive and passenger cars with night/day variations and door opening animations, and coal car (no lights or doors)
* bonus smoke animation included!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
